A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Two steps backwards towards the flashy\, hollow disaster that was the prequels.  There are genuine moments of authentic storytelling and character development (mostly focused on Luke and Rey's interaction)\, but they are drowned out by an overabundance of flashy CG locales\, aliens\, ships\, and aggregiously contrived plot holes.  It's a stark reminder that the Star Wars franchise has long been a marketing device\, and has abandoned its storytelling roots.
